sentences.en: ‘I flew out here feeling tired and overworked.’ ‘My heart bleeds for you!’ she replied.
sentences.cn: "我是乘飞机过来的，一路上觉得非常劳累。""我真为你伤心。"她答道。

sentences.en: A direct method for measuring this is the pressure bleed test.
sentences.cn: 一种直接测定的方法就是压力泌水试验.

sentences.en: Air - bleed passages are also sometimes called antisiphon passage.
sentences.cn: 空气渗入通道有时也称为防止虹吸通道.

sentences.en: Be careful when you wash these clothes because the colours may bleed.
sentences.cn: 洗这些衣服时小心点,因为可能会掉色.

sentences.en: His ex-wife clearly intends to bleed him for every last penny.
sentences.cn: 他的前妻显然是想榨干他每一分钱。

sentences.en: I closed on my finger and made it bleed when I closed the window.
sentences.cn: 我关窗子时挤破了手指.

sentences.en: I fall upon the thorns of life, I bleed.
sentences.cn: 我倒在人生的荆棘上, 淌着血.

sentences.en: If you cut your finger, it will bleed.
sentences.cn: 如果你割破手指, 它会流血.

sentences.en: She's going to bleed to death!
The air passage is called the air bleed.
The boss tried to bleed his employees for every penny they had.
sentences.cn: 老板力图从雇工们身上榨取出每一分钱.

sentences.en: The colouring pigments from the skins are not allowed to bleed into the grape juice.
sentences.cn: 外皮上的色素不能渗到葡萄汁里面去。

sentences.en: The faster fuel movement through the high - speed system causes more air to bleed into the system.
sentences.cn: 经过 高速 系统的较高流速的燃油会引起较多的空气渗入系统.

sentences.en: The valve shown has a pilot and a bleed orifice.
sentences.cn: 该阀具有控制孔和流出孔.

sentences.en: They mean to bleed the British to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 他们要最大限度地榨取英国人的财富。
非常不幸，她失血过多死了。

sentences.en: When she was sewing she pricked her finger and made it bleed.
sentences.cn: 她在做针线活时把手刺伤并流了血.

words.tran_cn: 不流血的；无血色的；没有精神的
血腥的；非常的；嗜杀的，残忍的；血色的
残忍地；血迹斑斑地，血腥地
流血不易停止的人；易出血的人；泄放器
出血；渗出（bleed的ing形式）；感到疼痛

phrases.tran_cn: 使耗尽财富，榨干（某人）的钱财
(讽)我（为你）心碎，伤心（表示说话人认为对方根本不值得同情）

trans.tran_cn: 流血，放血，渗开，榨取…的钱财，放掉气/液体
trans.tran_en: to lose blood, especially because of an injury
to lose blood, especially because of an injury
